definition: returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: But on the other hand, it is such a beautiful sight!
sentences.chinese: 但是话说回来，这是一个非常美丽的景象。

sentences.english: How do these high school kids spend their time, anyway?
sentences.chinese: 话说回来，这些高中小孩们到底是怎么打发时间的？

sentences.english: But then again, maybe we wouldn't see them.
sentences.chinese: 但话说回来，可能是我们没有看到。

sentences.english: And once again, it's also my responsibility to prove that I can do other things.
sentences.chinese: 话说回来，我也有责任去证明我能演别的角色。

sentences.english: But again, just put those details aside.
sentences.chinese: 但话说回来，撇开这些细节不谈。

sentences.english: But then again I like the lovely gherkins and the crisp crunchy lettuce.
sentences.chinese: 话说回来，我也喜欢可爱的小黄瓜和鲜脆的生菜。

sentences.english: But, then, the quick fix lifestyle today is getting more and more popular.
sentences.chinese: 但是，话说回来，现在快节奏生活方式越来越普遍了。

sentences.english: But it would be unfair to blame my failure entirely on my parents.
sentences.chinese: 不过话说回来，把责任全推给父母可不公平。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
to appear to be/to seem as if
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
